column1: # Test LFSR configurations for unit and integration tests
# Format: one coefficient vector per line
# These are known LFSR configurations for testing
# Simple 4-bit LFSR over GF(2) - known to have period 15 (maximal-length)
# LFSR over GF(3) - for testing non-binary fields
# LFSR over GF(5) - for testing larger prime fields
